Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 50 points in one of the greatest offensive performances in Pelicans history.
Jose Alvarado's assist-to-turnover ratio of 3.71 ranks sixth among all NBA players this season.
The Pelicans posted a turnover margin of plus-13 against Washington, their best margin of the campaign.
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum ranks second in scoring average through the first four NBA nights of 2025 with 36.0 points per game.
New Orleans has five roster members who have scored 40-plus points in a game during their NBA career.
Jose Alvarado's return to the lineup contributed to the Pelicans' best turnover margin of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Orleans is trying to win consecutive games for the first time since October 23 and 25.
Washington leads New Orleans in the all-time series 24-22, but the Pelicans have won three straight meetings.
